column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I went here for my birthday and our server was an absolute doll! He was funny and knowledgeable. It did take us a while to get our food but when it came it was totally worth it. Very high quality! Be aware the menu is very limited. The drinks are delicious
column2: the ambiance is amazing.! I do wish they would serve bread since their food takes so long.
